content:
Hi everyone. I am new and just join the FHIR chat. I am in search of person who get me through all this from start.
I need someone who is resource full to transfer tech and product and a system of continuous improvement in Healthcare.

Hey

Are you looking for a technical architect / developer that can help guide you to build a FHIR system ?

I can help as I have built FHIR systems as well as integrated it with other systems.

What’s your situation and what is your end goal ?

Regards

Ged
Please DM @Grahame Grieve to add a job posting to the stream #work opportunities . This stream is not intended to be used for such posts - thank you !
